channel.title: Tools-and-Projects on Anirudh Ramesh - The Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Tools-and-Projects on Anirudh Ramesh - The Portfolio

item.title: Diabetes_Predictor
item.description: Diabetes Predictor This Diabetes Predictor Application was built in Python using Scikit-Learn and Streamlit. It allows the user to enter their data and vitals, and uses multiple algorithms to provide a prediction based on previous data.
item.content:
Diabetes Predictor

This Diabetes Predictor Application was built in Python using Scikit-Learn and Streamlit. It allows the user to enter their data and vitals, and uses multiple algorithms to provide a prediction based on previous data.

item.title: Will You Be My Friend ?
item.description: Will You Be My Friend ? Will You Be My Friend is my entry to Brackeys’ Game Jam, a worldwide game creation event. The target of the Game Jam is to create a game from scratch in 7 days. This game was built using Unity3D and C#. Play it here: Play Will You Be My Friend ? on itch.io
item.content:
Will You Be My Friend ?

Will You Be My Friend is my entry to Brackeys’ Game Jam, a worldwide game creation event. The target of the Game Jam is to create a game from scratch in 7 days. This game was built using Unity3D and C#. Play it here:
